Bibliography

  • [sheilabhalla2014] Sheila Bhalla, Behind the Post-1991 'Challenge' to the Functional Efficiency of Established Statistical Institutions, Economic and Political Weekly, 49(7), (2014). link.
  • [unorganised2012] R Radhakrishna, Sheila Bhalla, Ravi, Srivastava, Reddy, Srijit Mishra, , Alakh Sharma, Chakraborty, , Shetty, Asis Kumar, Sharma, , Sarvesh Kumar, Sajeevan & Rajiv Mehta, Report of the Committee on Unorganised Sector Statistics, National Statistical Commission, Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Government of India (2012).
  • [rangarajancommission2001] National Statistical Commission, Report of the National Statistical Commission, Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Government of India, New Delhi (2001).
  • [ijae43703] Desai & Shah, Agricultural Statistics, Indian Journal of Agricultural Economics, 4(2), 48 (1949).
  • [ijae43793] Sastry, Agricultural Statistics, Indian Journal of Agricultural Economics, 2(1), 22 (1947).
  • [bansil1984] Bansil, Agricultural Statistics in India, Oxford and IBH Publishers, New Delhi (1984).
  • [ijae43813] Sastry, Agricultural Statistics of India, Indian Journal of Agricultural Economics, 1(1), 28 (1946).
  • [ijae43538] Desai & Shah, Agricultural Statistics Since Independence, Indian Journal of Agricultural Economics, 9(2), 47 (1954).
  • [mcsinghi_iip_asi] M C Singhi, Index of Industrial Production and Annual Survey of Industries, Working Paper, Office of Economic Adviser, Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion (DIPP), Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Government of India, New Delhi .
